about_the_game:
Dive into Vox Battles, a multiplayer battle royale offering fast-paced combat and strategic gameplay. Select your unique Vox champion, engage in thrilling arena battles with up to 8 players, and craft weapons for survival. Vox Battles combines casual and competitive elements.

Key Features:
  • Diverse Vox Champions: Choose from a variety of Vox characters, each with distinct gameplay modifiers based on their class.
  • Dynamic Arenas: Battle across visually captivating biomes, each presenting unique challenges and thematic elements.
  • Crafting System: Start with no weapons; scavenge for materials and craft basic weapons, health, and energy boosts for a strategic edge.
  • Multiplayer and AI Modes: Engage in thrilling multiplayer battles with up to 12 participants, supplemented by AI characters as needed. Practice offline against AI enemies.
  • Progressive Development: Vox Battles will evolve through phases, introducing new mechanics to add more strategic decision making, expanding the game world with additional biomes and play modes.

short_description: Get ready for a blast in Vox Battles, a multiplayer mayhem of fast-paced fights and clever strategy. Choose a Vox champion and dive into an arena with up to 8 players, hunt for weapons to survive. With 3 unique biomes, Vox Battles is where casual meets competition, all in one fantastic showdown!
